name: LVBuild
description: Build a LabVIEW Build Spec from an existing project
author: Matt Pollock

inputs.name: lvPrjPath
inputs.label: Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to .lvproj file containing the build specification(s)

inputs.name: lvPrjTarget
inputs.label: Target Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the target in the project

inputs.name: lvPrjBldName
inputs.label: Build Spec Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the build specification.  If blank, all build specifications under the selected target will be built.

inputs.name: lvCLIType
inputs.label: LV CLI Type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Determines which command-line interface (CLI) to use.  
- NI: Built-in LabVIEW CLI, ships with LabVIEW in LabVIEW 2018 and later, compatible with LabVIEW 2014 and later.  [More information:](http://zone.ni.com/reference/en-XX/help/371361R-01/lvhowto/cli_running_operations/) 
- Wiresmith: 3rd-party LabVIEW CLI comptible with LabVIEW 2011 and later.  [More information:](https://github.com/JamesMc86/LabVIEW-CLI/wiki/Getting-Started-With-LabVIEW-CLI) 
 - Use variable setting: not yet implemented
